home.title: Professional Sewing Production
home.subtitle: Quality clothing and textile products made to order
home.aboutText:
We are a professional outerwear production with many years of experience.

We specialize in sewing quality women's and men's clothing, as well as textile products for various fields.

We fulfill wholesale orders, private label and individual projects for brands and stores.
home.qualityText1:
Our production is equipped with modern equipment, and experienced craftsmen work on each project.

We guarantee high quality execution, pattern accuracy and adherence to deadlines.
home.qualityText2:
Each product undergoes step-by-step quality control — from cutting to finished product.

This ensures stable, impeccable results for our clients.
home.service1Description: Every season we develop new collections of women's outerwear that meet global trends and comfort requirements.
home.service2Description: We create custom collections — from concept development, patterns and size grading to finished products with your logo and packaging.
home.service3Description: We provide industrial fabric cutting services on automated Gerber system — with maximum precision, speed and material savings.
home.service4Description: We perform artistic and technological quilting on modern equipment. We develop individual patterns and textures.
home.service5Description: We create embroidery that emphasizes your brand's individuality: logos, names, brand details and even designer elements.
home.service6Description: We use leftover materials after sewing main collections to create stylish and practical accessories — bags, cosmetic cases and protective cases.

history.title: Our History
history.subtitle: The development path of our production
history.introText:
The history of our enterprise began in 1988. It all started with a small shoe workshop.

In 1992, the ADONIS brand officially appeared.

Since then, production has developed, technologies have improved, volumes have increased, and we were first presented on the international market. That is why the brand symbol remains unchanged — boots with the Adonis flower, which still reminds us of the company's footwear origins today.

Since 2002, the enterprise began a new chapter in its history — the production of women's outerwear.

Our main principles remain unchanged: experience, quality, professionalism.

We know how important it is for every woman — regardless of size — to feel confident and beautiful. That is why our collections cover a wide size range — from 42 to 80.

Our main qualification now is the production of women's outerwear. At the same time, we have experience in developing men's collections and children's models, which allows us to flexibly implement various partner requests.

For rational use of resources and minimization of production waste, we give fabrics a second life. We use leftover materials after sewing main Adonis collections to create stylish and practical accessories — bags, cosmetic cases and protective cases for beauty master tools. This approach allows us not only to care for the environment, but also to create useful products with unique design.

We work with love for details: from cutting to finishing, from fabric selection to hardware. Our jackets, coats and vests are the result of experience, craftsmanship and modern technologies, including our own embroidery and quilting services.

Adonis is more than just production. It's a team that understands that every product is a story that combines style, quality and care.
history.cooperationText: TM Adonis invites wholesale buyers to cooperate and offers them to replenish their assortment with goods that invariably enjoy increased demand from customers!

present.description: Modern production of women's and men's outerwear with a wide size range 42–78. We work with a full cycle: own embroidery, quilting, pattern development, individual orders and private label.

adonisCollection.title: ADONIS Own Collection
adonisCollection.description: Every season we develop new collections of women's outerwear that meet global trends and comfort requirements. We offer wholesale sales of ADONIS collections for stores, showrooms and online platforms.

brandProduction.title: Production Under Your Brand
brandProduction.description: We create custom collections — from concept development, patterns and size grading to finished products with your logo and packaging. We have extensive experience in outsourcing and provide a complete production cycle, modern equipment, quality control at every stage, confidentiality and strict adherence to deadlines.

gerberCutting.title: Automated Cutting on Gerber Complex
gerberCutting.description: We provide industrial fabric cutting services on automated Gerber system — with maximum precision, speed and material savings. Perfect solution for brands and manufacturers who need quality cutting without waste.

quilting.title: Fabric Quilting
quilting.description: We perform artistic and technological quilting on modern equipment. We develop individual patterns and textures, creating spectacular solutions for outerwear collections, accessories and interior textiles. We work with different types of fabrics and fillers.
features: Different types of fabrics and fillers

embroidery.title: Embroidery on Any Types of Fabrics
embroidery.description: We create embroidery that emphasizes your brand's individuality: logos, names, brand details and even designer or artistic elements. Modern German equipment ensures perfect accuracy. Maximum working field 60×70 cm. We embroider on any types of fabrics with impeccable quality and attention to every detail.

bags.title: Accessories from Fabric Recycling
bags.description: For rational use of resources and minimization of production waste, we give fabrics a second life. We use leftover materials after sewing main Adonis collections to create stylish and practical accessories — bags, cosmetic cases and protective cases for beauty master tools. This approach allows us not only to care for the environment, but also to create useful products with unique design.

seo.title: Production and Sale of Women's Outerwear Wholesale from Manufacturer
seo.intro: Looking for a reliable partner to scale your business? Our company is a leading Ukrainian manufacturer of women's outerwear, specializing in sewing modern collections with perfect fit. We offer favorable conditions for those interested in women's outerwear wholesale directly from the manufacturer.
seo.advantage1Text: Our hallmark is inclusivity: we manufacture clothing in a wide size range from 42 to 72. Specialization in Plus Size direction and professional pattern development allow us to create models that have high demand among end consumers.
seo.cooperation1Title: wholesale and bulk wholesale at direct production prices;
seo.cooperation2Title: sewing outsourcing (Private Label) — manufacturing collections under your own brand.
seo.conclusion:
Thanks to our own production cycle, we guarantee strict quality control and supply stability.

Contact our manager to get detailed information about the assortment and discuss individual cooperation terms.

The backpack has a voluminous quilted texture and reliable fittings, and its thoughtful design with a top handle allows you to easily change the way you carry it. Thanks to its compact size and elegant design, the Michelle model will become the main accent of your wardrobe, adding special status and warmth to it.

sumka-polunychka-bag.name: Strawberry Bag
sumka-polunychka-bag.altText: Crossbody bag for women brand Adonis quilted beige
sumka-polunychka-bag.userText:
Strawberry Bag
This charming cross-body model got its name due to its appetizing rounded shape and voluminous quilted texture, reminiscent of the surface of a berry. The accessory is made of a pleasant-to-the-touch material with a light silky sheen that plays beautifully in daylight. The front panel is decorated with a large golden emblem, which adds sophistication to the product, and a double zipper provides convenient access to the main compartment. The contrasting black strap and laconic top handle allow you to carry the bag both in your hands and over your shoulder, making it the perfect romantic addition to your everyday or festive looks.

sumka-richi-bag-ryukzak-backpack.name: Ritchie's backpack
sumka-richi-bag-ryukzak-backpack.altText: Pale pink backpack for women by Adonis with gold accessories
sumka-richi-bag-ryukzak-backpack.userText:
Richie Backpack
This ergonomic backpack will become an indispensable companion in the dynamic urban rhythm. The model combines two types of quilted texture: classic diamonds on the main body and a smaller patch pocket, which creates an interesting visual volume. Thanks to the soft shoulder straps and an additional top handle, the accessory provides maximum comfort throughout the day, easily accommodating all the necessary gadgets and personal belongings.

sumka-richi-black-bag-ryukzak-backpack.name: Ritchie's backpack
sumka-richi-black-bag-ryukzak-backpack.altText: Black backpack by Adonis for women with gold and patch pocket
sumka-richi-black-bag-ryukzak-backpack.userText:
Richie Backpack
A stylish backpack that successfully combines a sporty silhouette with exquisite decoration. The model's special charm is added by the noble satin sheen of the material and the shining metal emblem, which serves as the main decorative element. High-quality fittings with a smooth movement and a well-thought-out system of compartments make this accessory not only a fashionable accent of your image, but also a standard of practicality for everyday use.

sumka-rivyera-bag.name: Riviera Bag
sumka-rivyera-bag.altText: Adonis Gray Hundred Dollar Textile Bag for Women with Gold. Has two patch pockets
sumka-rivyera-bag.userText:
Riviera Bag
This roomy model in the format of a voluminous shopper is created for those who combine an active lifestyle with business affairs. The main advantage of the bag is its impressive functionality: the internal space allows you to freely place a laptop, documents and personal belongings necessary during the day. The expressive voluminous weaving gives the accessory a modern look, and reliable double handles guarantee comfort even when fully loaded.

sumka-rivyera-blue-yellow-bag.name: Riviera Bag
sumka-rivyera-blue-yellow-bag.altText: Adonis bags blue and yellow, one hundred furry fabric, gold accessories
sumka-rivyera-blue-yellow-bag.userText:
Riviera Bag
A stylish and practical accessory that easily transforms from an everyday bag into a convenient work case thanks to the ability to place a laptop inside. The model is decorated with accent external zipper pockets that add dynamism to the design and allow you to keep small items in perfect order. The exquisite quilted texture combined with the brand's golden hardware makes this model a universal solution for the office, gym or short trips.

sumka-ryukzak-backpack-bag.name: Teddy's Backpack
sumka-ryukzak-backpack-bag.altText: Yellow little adonis backpack with silver hardware and chains
sumka-ryukzak-backpack-bag.userText:
Teddy Backpack
An elegant mini backpack that combines a laconic design and ergonomics. Geometric stitching creates a stylish visual effect, and the soft top handle and adjustable straps provide comfortable wearing in various ways. The model is equipped with high-quality zippers with metal pullers, which guarantee durability and ease of use. This accessory will become a basic element of your wardrobe, adding modern dynamics and completeness to the image.

sumka-shynshyla-bag.name: Chinchilla Bag
sumka-shynshyla-bag.altText: Women's small bag with faux fur and quilted Adonis fabric, delicate powder color, gold accessories
sumka-shynshyla-bag.userText:
Chinchilla Bag
This luxurious model is created for true connoisseurs of comfort and premium design in their winter wardrobe. The main feature of the bag is a massive flap, trimmed with extremely soft eco-fur, imitating the noble texture of chinchilla. The main part of the product is made of delicately quilted material with a light pearlescent sheen, and the exquisite golden kiss-lock adds the final touch of elegance to the image.

sumka-tedi-bag-ryukzak-backpack.name: Teddy's Backpack
sumka-tedi-bag-ryukzak-backpack.altText: Brightly colored backpacks Adonis turquoise , orange, yellow with silver accessories
sumka-tedi-bag-ryukzak-backpack.userText:
Teddy Backpack
This compact model impresses with its lightness and thoughtful silhouette, which is ideal for daily walks. The product is made of soft material with a classic small stitch, which gives it a characteristic volume and protects the contents. Despite its miniature appearance, the backpack has a convenient main compartment and an additional patch pocket for small items, which allows you to rationally organize the space. The exquisite metal emblem and reliable fittings emphasize the premium quality of the accessory.

sumka-ukka-bag-poyasna-sumka.name: Yucca Bag
sumka-ukka-bag-poyasna-sumka.altText: Adonis Faux Fur Waist Bag with Black Eco Leather Handle
sumka-ukka-bag-poyasna-sumka.userText:
Yukka Bag
This stylish and incredibly pleasant to the touch accessory will be the main accent of your winter or demi-season look. The model is made of thick eco-fur, which gives a feeling of warmth and comfort, and the contrasting eco-leather insert around the zipper adds structure and practicality to the design. Thanks to the ergonomic shape and adjustable strap, the bag is comfortable to wear both on the belt and over the shoulder, freeing your hands and keeping all the necessary little things under reliable protection.

sumka-valeri-bag.name: Velari bag
sumka-valeri-bag.altText: The sotban bag is black  in combination with Adonis felt, has two handles and black fittings
sumka-valeri-bag.userText:
Valerie Bag
This elegant model in the format of a shopper is the perfect choice for creating a sophisticated everyday look. The main feature of the bag is a harmonious combination of materials: smooth side inserts and a central panel with an expressive quilted texture in the form of a "herringbone". The trapezoidal shape provides incredible capacity, allowing you to keep everything you need at hand, and the laconic double handles guarantee comfort when carrying on the shoulder or in your hands. Thanks to the discreet design and emphasis on details, the Valerie model will become a reliable wardrobe base.

sumka-viktoria-bag.name: Victoria bag
sumka-viktoria-bag.altText: Small Cross Bodysuit Bag Women's Honeydew Adonis with Gold Hardware
sumka-viktoria-bag.userText:
Victoria Bag
This laconic rectangular cross-body model is created for connoisseurs of functional minimalism. The accessory is decorated with a thick quilted texture in the form of small diamonds, which gives it a refined volume and special softness. The compact size is ideal for the most necessary things, and the long adjustable strap allows you to comfortably carry the bag over your shoulder, freeing your hands for walks around the city. The central metal emblem gives the product a recognizable corporate style, making it a universal addition to any wardrobe.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Protection of your personal data
privacy.content:
1. GENERAL PROVISIONS

1.1. This Privacy Policy (hereinafter — "Policy") defines the procedure for processing and protection of personal data of users of the ADONIS website (hereinafter — "Site"), which belongs to ADONIS sewing production (hereinafter — "Company").

1.2. By using the Site, you automatically agree to the terms of this Policy.

2. COLLECTION OF PERSONAL DATA

2.1. The Company collects and processes the following personal data:
- First and last name
- Phone number
- Email address
- Messages you send through the contact form

2.2. Personal data is collected solely with your consent and to provide the services you request.

3. USE OF PERSONAL DATA

3.1. The Company uses personal data to:
- Contact you regarding your inquiries and orders
- Provide information about services and products
- Improve service quality
- Send important messages regarding your orders

3.2. The Company does not transfer personal data to third parties without your consent, except in cases provided by the legislation of Ukraine.

4. PROTECTION OF PERSONAL DATA

4.1. The Company takes all necessary measures to protect personal data from unauthorized access, modification, disclosure or destruction.

4.2. Personal data is stored on secure servers with limited access.

5. USER RIGHTS

5.1. You have the right to:
- Receive information about the processing of your personal data
- Request correction of inaccurate data
- Request deletion of your personal data
- Withdraw consent to the processing of personal data

5.2. To exercise your rights, contact the Company at: adonisinfo8@gmail.com

6. COOKIES

6.1. The Site may use cookies to improve site functionality and collect statistics.

6.2. You can configure your browser to refuse cookies, but this may affect the functionality of the Site.

7. CHANGES TO THE PRIVACY POLICY

7.1. The Company reserves the right to make changes to this Policy. All changes are published on this page.

7.2. By continuing to use the Site after changes are made, you agree to the new terms.

8. CONTACTS

8.1. For all questions regarding the processing of personal data, contact:
Email: adonisinfo8@gmail.com
Phone: +38 099 222 55 29
Address: Kharkiv, Ukraine
